title: Habits Dashboard
summary: A few key habits I've been tracking visualized with a dashboard pulled from Google Calendar.

title: Advanced Mortgage Payoff Simulator
summary: An advanced mortgage payoff simulator with a clean dashboard UI and a paydown chart.

title: Sheets to Slack
summary: Send Google Sheets data to Slack with scheduled messages, slash-command triggers, and a visual post builder.

title: Google Sheets Theme Generator
summary: Generate and apply cohesive color themes to Google Sheets with dark mode, saved themes, and font selection.

title: Daily Wisdom Chrome Extension
summary: A Chrome extension that displays a random quote from a curated list of authors every day.
